name: Mini-Mart
description:
A nice day to do some weekly grocery shopping. Wind down with this simple and sweet grocery simulator. Use the mouse to navigate through a cute little store and interact with several fun items, like eggs with scribbled faces. This game features serene music and simple tasks meant to relax. So grab your grocery bags and get ready to shop.

This game was made as a collaborative effort between Roman Collazo, Michelle Kim, Zoey Laytart, and Matthew Meacham for the classes ARTG and CMPM 120 at UC Santa Cruz
